intro: Guettarda shaferi, commonly known as the Hawaiian guettarda, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its evergreen nature, with small, glossy, dark green leaves. It produces clusters of white, fragrant flowers that bloom throughout the year. Guettarda shaferi is often found in coastal and lowland habitats, thriving in well-drained soils.
